price: Na gyina pintinn, na fa w’anim kyerε ͻsom a εtene no; na hwε na wankͻka abosomsomfoͻ no ho.
arabic: وَأَنۡ أَقِمۡ وَجۡهَكَ لِلدِّينِ حَنِيفٗا وَلَا تَكُونَنَّ مِنَ ٱلۡمُشۡرِكِينَ

version.title: Ashanti Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Ashanti by Sheikh Haroun Ismaeel

meta.transliteration: wa-an aqim wajhaka lilddīni ḥanīfan walā takūnanna mina al-mush'rikīna
